original_text: Everywhere that I go, God is there to attack me. He is ready to destroy me. He has taken away my hope, as if he has dug a tree out of the ground. Everywhere that I go, God is there to attack me.
korean_text: 사면으로 나를 헐으시니 나는 죽었구나 내 희망을 나무 뽑듯 뽑으시고

sentences.original_text: God is there to attack me
He is ready to destroy me
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나를 파괴할 준비가 되어 있습니다

sentences.original_text: He has taken away my hope
as if he has dug a tree out of the ground
God is there to attack me
